import './App.css'; import './output.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; const NavBar = ({ user, onLogout }) => { const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { if (onLogout) { onLogout(); } }; const toggleMobileMenu = () => { setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen); }; return (
{/* Logo */}

{/* Navigation Links */}
🏠 Home
✨ Features
{/* User Menu */}
{user ? ( <> {/* User Info */}

Welcome, {user.username}! 🌸

Level {user.level || 1}
{user.points || 0} pts
{user.profilePicture ? ( ) : (
{user.username.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}
)}
{/* Dashboard Link */} 🌸 My Space {/* Logout Button */} ) : ( <> {/* Login/Signup Links */} 🔑 Login 🌟 Sign Up )} {/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile menu */}
setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > 🏠 Home setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > ✨ Features {user && ( <>

Welcome, {user.username}! 🌸

Level {user.level || 1} • {user.points || 0} points

setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > 🌸 My Space )}
); }; export default NavBar;
